title: MTAD-GAT
authors: Hang Zhao, Yujing Wang, Juanyong Duan, Congrui Huang, Defu Cao, Yunhai Tong, Bixiong Xu, Jing Bai, Jie Tong, Qi Zhang

parameters.name: mag_window_size
parameters.description: Window size for sliding window average calculation

parameters.name: context_window_size
parameters.description: Window for mean in SR cleaning

parameters.name: epochs
parameters.description: Number of times the algorithm trains on the dataset

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.description: Number of data points propagated in parallel

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.description: Window size for windowing of Time Series

parameters.name: gamma
parameters.description: Importance factor for posterior in scoring

parameters.name: early_stopping_patience
parameters.description: If 1 - (loss / last_loss) is less than `delta` for `patience` epochs, stop

parameters.name: early_stopping_delta
parameters.description: If 1 - (loss / last_loss) is less than `delta` for `patience` epochs, stop

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Seed for the random number generator

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.description: Number of data points propagated in parallel

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Seed for the random number generator
